definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
(of a lazy or incompetent teacher) to hamper students' progress/(of media) to propagate errors/to lead people astray
young fellow countryman/young person from the same village

sentences.english: Now, thou son of man, wilt thou judge, wilt thou judge the bloody city?
sentences.chinese: 人子阿，你要審問審問這流人血的城嗎。

sentences.english: 27At that time they will see the Son of Man coming in a cloud with power and great glory.
sentences.chinese: 那時，他們要看見人子有能力，有大榮耀駕雲降臨。

sentences.english: In the same way the Son of Man is going to suffer at their hands.
sentences.chinese: 人子也將要這樣受他們的害。

sentences.english: And as in the days of Noe, so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
sentences.chinese: 就如在諾厄的時日怎樣，人子的來臨也要怎樣。

sentences.english: Look, " he said, "I see heaven open and the Son of Man standing at the right hand of God."
sentences.chinese: 就說，我看見天開了，人子站在神的右邊。

sentences.english: And said, Behold, I see the heavens opened, and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God.
sentences.chinese: 就說，我看見天開了，人子站在神的右邊。

sentences.english: Northern Zhou spent in Yuzhong County, the County and the Son of Man, is still Jincheng County.
sentences.chinese: 北周廢榆中縣，其地並人子城縣，仍屬金城郡。

sentences.english: 62What if you see the Son of Man ascend to where he was before!
sentences.chinese: 倘或你們看見人子升到他原來所在之處，怎麼樣呢？

sentences.english: And no man hath ascended up to heaven, but he that came down from heaven, even the Son of man which is in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 除了從天降下仍舊在天的人子，沒有人升過天。

sentences.english: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before?
sentences.chinese: 倘或你們看見人子升到他原來所在之處，怎嗎樣呢。

sentences.english: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God.
sentences.chinese: 從今以後，人子要坐在神權能的右邊。

sentences.english: Now let me dispel a few rumors so they don't fester into facts.
sentences.chinese: 我首先要消除一些謠言，免得誤人子弟。

sentences.english: Then said he unto me, Son of man, lift up thine eyes now the way toward the north.
sentences.chinese: 神對我說，人子阿，你舉目向北觀看。

sentences.english: For the son of man should know filial piety, is an undefeated flower.
sentences.chinese: 爲人子應知孝敬，孝心是一朵不敗的花。

sentences.english: For the son of man, the more when parents filial piety.
sentences.chinese: 爲人子者，更當孝養怙恃。

sentences.english: But Jesus said unto him, Judas, betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss?
sentences.chinese: 耶穌對他說，猶大，你用親嘴的暗號賣人子嗎。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
